text: ai mere qaid khaane ke dono rapheeqo (achchha ab taabeer suno tumamen se ek (jisane angoor dekha riha hokar) apane maalik ko sharaab pilaane ka kaam karega aur (doosara) jisane rotiyaan sar par (dekhee hain) to soolee diya jaega aur chidiya usake sar se (noch noch) kar khaegee jis amr ko tum donon darayaapht karate the (vah ye hai aur) phaisala ho chuka hai
